A new catechisme very usefull for persons of meanest capacity and shortest memory, and for them onely composed : and since fitted to the directions concerning suspension from the Lords Supper in case of ignorance, and published / by T. Mocket ... Mocket, Thomas, 1602-1670?
[2], 20 p.
Printed by A.M. for Christopher Meredith ..., London : 1647.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
